name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-extract-table-from-pdf-covert-to-csv
title: Extract table from a PDF file and convert it to csv format.
shortDescription: This Power Automate for desktop Copilot prompt helps in extracting table from a PDF file and covert it to csv format.
longDescription: This Power Automate for desktop Copilot prompt helps in extracting table from a PDF file and covert it to csv format. Save the csv data at a specific output file path.

metadata.value: Extract table from [source pdf filepath]. Display message if file not found. Save extracted table in csv format at [target csv filepath]

thumbnails.alt: Preview of prompt in Power Automate for desktop Copilot
